thread.title: Wolves loan Tommy Rowe to Scunthorpe
thread.title_full: Wolves loan Tommy Rowe to Scunthorpe

title: Wolves loan Tommy Rowe to Scunthorpe
text:
Log in and start commenting 
Rowe missed the second half of last season and most of the summer with foot and knee injures, which restricted him to just 14 games. 
The Mancunian wide man is out of contract at the end of this campaign, but his immediate focus is to just get back playing regularly. Receive daily email updates from the Express & Star
